text: I'm a I'm a big video gamer and I hate
people who dismiss it and like they say
it's a waste of time and like rots your
brain I've learned a lot like from video
games throughout my life like I was at a
bar a couple nights ago and uh these two
guys started going at it just an allout
brawl and I immediately got in the
background and started doing this
[Applause]
cuz I've played Street Fighter
before and no when watching two grown
men fight you must stand in the
background and do repetitive arm motions
the entire
time if it's an alley fight you need to
hold on to a chicken and do
this if you happen to be on a bike at
the time you have to ride it back and
forth aimlessly with no sense of
direction till it's over is it done all
right see you
guys those are the rules
